name: Aggregated Status Collection

Status in table
Status in chart
12-Month Temperature Data
func:
var tempData = []

const months = [
    "Jan",
    "Feb",
    "Mar",
    "Apr",
    "May",
    "Jun",
    "Jul",
    "Aug",
    "Sep",
    "Oct",
    "Nov",
    "Dec"
]

for (var i = 0; i < months.length; i++) {
    const dataSet = {
        "temp" : Math.random() * 30,
        "month" : months[i]
    }
    tempData.push(dataSet)
}

msg.payload = tempData

return msg;
